slogan: Amaan – Because every soul deserves a chance for life, care, and love.
title: Join building 'Aman'... the first permanent rescue and care home for animals
description:
Thousands of small souls live in the streets without shelter, suffering in silence, waiting for a helping hand.
The 'Aman' project is a dream we draw together — a permanent shelter that provides care, warmth, and food for every voiceless animal.
Your donation today doesn't just save a single life; it helps build a house of life... a safe haven for those lost in the open.
input: Enter the amount you wish to donate in USD
sentence: Stone by stone, with your support... we build Safety.
heading: Real Steps Towards Safety
description2: With the support of kind hearts, we've been able to rescue and adopt thousands of cases... Now, we begin the most important phase together: realizing the dream and opening the first permanent shelter that brings all these little hearts together in one place.
stat2: Cases of medical treatment and rehabilitation
message_heading: Our mission at "Aman": A safe life for every being
message_description: At Aman, we believe that every living creature, no matter how small or weak, deserves protection, care, and shelter. We work to create a permanent home that embraces these souls, away from cruelty, neglect, or pain. We aim not only to rescue but to build a loving, conscious society that believes mercy begins with the weakest of God's creation.
